import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap' import ChatContent from './components/ChatContent/ChatContent' import useChat from './logic/useChat' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Chat = () => { const {state} = useLocation(); const {isLoading,error,messages,handleSend,setMsg,msgLoading,msgError} = useChat(state.id) return (

{state.name}

setMsg(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Chat
